overview: When former Bond Girl Carole Ashby is rushed to hospital whilst moving home, it triggers an emotional journey of self discovery through time.  â€‹  It all begins with the discovery of an old ring, memories of an imaginary friend and a forgotten family on the borders of Sheffield and the Peak District.  Travelling north from her home in London she teams up with Dr Roger Doonan from the Department of Archaeology at Sheffield University and his psychic colleague Paul Denton and with their help uncovers not only her own strange family secrets but the secrets of an ancient and mysterious landscape.
title: Ashby's Odyssey
